title: Journalist

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, Sensationalize any player, framing them as a random evil role from any REF in-game.
- Report: You start with 0 Charges of Report. You may spend a charge and select a player: you learn everyone that player has visited tonight and on previous nights. You learn if they attacked anyone on those nights.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When a player you Sensationalize is investigated, you'll be given a charge of Report.
- RB and control imune
